diseases.name: Common Cold
follow_up_questions: How many days have you had symptoms?
Do you have a fever?

diseases.name: Influenza (Flu)
follow_up_questions: Did your symptoms begin suddenly?
Are you at risk for complications?

diseases.name: COVID-19
treatment: Seek medical care if symptoms worsen
follow_up_questions: Have you been exposed to someone with COVID-19?
Are you experiencing difficulty breathing?

diseases.name: Appendicitis
symptoms: Abdominal pain (starts near the navel, moves to lower right)
treatment: Emergency surgical removal of the appendix
follow_up_questions: Did the abdominal pain move from your navel to the lower right side?
Is the pain worsening with movement?

diseases.name: Migraine
treatment: Rest in a dark, quiet room
follow_up_questions: Is your headache accompanied by visual disturbances?
Does light worsen your headache?

diseases.name: Diabetes Mellitus
follow_up_questions: Have you noticed unexplained weight loss?
Do you experience frequent urination?

diseases.name: Hypertension
follow_up_questions: Have you had recent blood pressure readings?
Do you experience frequent headaches?

diseases.name: Asthma
follow_up_questions: Do you experience shortness of breath during exercise?
Do you have a history of allergies?

diseases.name: Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
follow_up_questions: Have you been a smoker?
Do you experience breathlessness during routine activities?

diseases.name: Pneumonia
follow_up_questions: Is your cough producing phlegm?
Are you experiencing chest pain when breathing?

diseases.name: Tuberculosis
follow_up_questions: Have you been in contact with someone with TB?
Are you experiencing night sweats?

diseases.name: Bronchitis
follow_up_questions: Is your cough severe?
Have you had bronchitis before?

diseases.name: Gastroenteritis
follow_up_questions: Have you traveled recently?
Do you have a fever?

diseases.name: Urinary Tract Infection (UTI)
follow_up_questions: Do you experience pain during urination?
Have you had UTIs before?

diseases.name: Stroke (Cerebrovascular Accident)
follow_up_questions: Did your symptoms come on suddenly?
Is one side of your body weaker than the other?

diseases.name: Heart Attack (Myocardial Infarction)
follow_up_questions: Is the chest pain severe and persistent?
Do you have a history of heart disease?

diseases.name: Osteoarthritis
follow_up_questions: Does your joint pain worsen with activity?
Are you over 50 years old?

diseases.name: Rheumatoid Arthritis
follow_up_questions: Are your joints swollen in the morning?
Is there symmetrical joint pain?

diseases.name: Gout
symptoms: Severe joint pain (often in the big toe)
follow_up_questions: Is the pain concentrated in one joint?
Do you have a history of high uric acid?

diseases.name: Peptic Ulcer Disease
follow_up_questions: Do you experience burning stomach pain?
Is the pain relieved by eating?

diseases.name: Gallstones
follow_up_questions: Do you experience severe pain after eating fatty foods?
Have you noticed jaundice?

diseases.name: Kidney Stones
symptoms: Severe pain in the back or side
follow_up_questions: Do you experience severe flank pain?
Have you noticed blood in your urine?

diseases.name: Hepatitis A
follow_up_questions: Have you been exposed to contaminated food or water?
Do you have jaundice?

diseases.name: Hepatitis B
follow_up_questions: Do you have a history of liver disease?
Have you been vaccinated for hepatitis B?

diseases.name: Hepatitis C
follow_up_questions: Have you been exposed to contaminated needles?
Do you have a history of liver issues?

diseases.name: HIV/AIDS
follow_up_questions: Have you engaged in high-risk behaviors?
Have you had unprotected sex or needle sharing?

diseases.name: Lyme Disease
follow_up_questions: Have you been in tick-infested areas?
Do you recall a tick bite?

diseases.name: Malaria
follow_up_questions: Have you traveled to malaria-endemic regions?
Do you have cyclic fevers?

diseases.name: Dengue Fever
follow_up_questions: Have you traveled to tropical areas?
Is your muscle or joint pain severe?

diseases.name: Zika Virus
follow_up_questions: Have you been in areas with Zika outbreaks?
Do you have a rash with joint pain?

diseases.name: Ebola Virus Disease
follow_up_questions: Have you been in regions with Ebola outbreaks?
Are you experiencing severe gastrointestinal symptoms?

diseases.name: Chickenpox (Varicella)
follow_up_questions: Have you been exposed to chickenpox?
Do you have an itchy rash starting on the face?

diseases.name: Shingles (Herpes Zoster)
follow_up_questions: Have you had chickenpox before?
Is the rash localized on one side of your body?

diseases.name: Measles
follow_up_questions: Have you been vaccinated for measles?
Did the rash start on your face and spread downward?

diseases.name: Mumps
follow_up_questions: Have you been vaccinated for mumps?
Do you notice swelling near your jaw?

diseases.name: Rubella (German measles)
follow_up_questions: Have you been vaccinated for rubella?
Do you have a mild rash and joint pain?

diseases.name: Whooping Cough (Pertussis)
symptoms: Severe coughing fits with a whooping sound
follow_up_questions: Is your cough paroxysmal with a whooping sound?
Have you been exposed to pertussis?

diseases.name: Polio (Poliomyelitis)
follow_up_questions: Have you been vaccinated for polio?
Do you experience sudden muscle weakness?

diseases.name: Leprosy
follow_up_questions: Do you have discolored patches on your skin with numbness?
Have you been in an endemic area?

diseases.name: Multiple Sclerosis
follow_up_questions: Have you experienced episodes of vision loss?
Do you have limb weakness?

diseases.name: Parkinson's Disease
follow_up_questions: Do you experience tremors or slow movement?
Has your balance been affected?

diseases.name: Alzheimer's Disease
follow_up_questions: Do you notice significant memory loss?
Is confusion a new development?

diseases.name: Epilepsy
follow_up_questions: Have you experienced unprovoked seizures?
Do you have a history of neurological issues?

diseases.name: Anxiety Disorder
follow_up_questions: Do you experience persistent worry?
Have you had panic attacks?

diseases.name: Depression
follow_up_questions: Have you felt depressed for more than two weeks?
Is it difficult to enjoy activities you once liked?

diseases.name: Bipolar Disorder
follow_up_questions: Do you experience extreme mood changes?
Have you had periods of high energy followed by depression?

diseases.name: Schizophrenia
follow_up_questions: Do you experience auditory hallucinations?
Do you have delusional beliefs?

diseases.name: Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder (OCD)
follow_up_questions: Do you have repetitive behaviors that interfere with daily life?
Are you troubled by persistent intrusive thoughts?

diseases.name: Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
follow_up_questions: Have you experienced a traumatic event?
Do you have recurring distressing memories?

diseases.name: Eating Disorder (Anorexia Nervosa)
follow_up_questions: Do you have a distorted view of your body?
Have you experienced significant weight loss?

diseases.name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
follow_up_questions: Does your pain improve after a bowel movement?
Do you alternate between constipation and diarrhea?

diseases.name: Crohn's Disease
follow_up_questions: Do you have chronic abdominal pain and diarrhea?
Have you experienced weight loss with digestive issues?

diseases.name: Ulcerative Colitis
follow_up_questions: Do you notice blood in your stool?
Is your pain accompanied by frequent bowel movements?

diseases.name: Celiac Disease
follow_up_questions: Do you feel discomfort after eating gluten?
Have you been tested for celiac disease?

diseases.name: Hypothyroidism
follow_up_questions: Do you feel unusually tired?
Have you had your thyroid levels checked?

diseases.name: Hyperthyroidism
follow_up_questions: Do you feel unusually anxious or notice a rapid heartbeat?
Have you lost weight without trying?

diseases.name: Anemia (Iron Deficiency)
follow_up_questions: Do you feel tired often?
Have you been tested for iron deficiency?

diseases.name: Sickle Cell Disease
follow_up_questions: Do you experience recurring pain episodes?
Have you been diagnosed with a blood disorder?

diseases.name: Hemophilia
follow_up_questions: Do you have a family history of bleeding disorders?
Have you experienced unexplained bleeding?

diseases.name: Leukemia
follow_up_questions: Do you have frequent infections or unexplained bruising?
Have you experienced significant weight loss?

diseases.name: Lymphoma
follow_up_questions: Do you have persistent swollen lymph nodes?
Have you experienced night sweats?

diseases.name: Melanoma
follow_up_questions: Have you noticed changes in a mole?
Do you have a family history of skin cancer?

diseases.name: Breast Cancer
follow_up_questions: Have you noticed any lumps in your breast?
Do you have a family history of breast cancer?

diseases.name: Prostate Cancer
follow_up_questions: Are you experiencing urinary difficulties?
Have you been screened for prostate issues?

diseases.name: Lung Cancer
follow_up_questions: Are you a current or former smoker?
Do you have chronic cough or chest pain?

diseases.name: Colon Cancer
follow_up_questions: Do you have a family history of colon cancer?
Have you noticed changes in your bowel habits?

diseases.name: Skin Cancer (Non-Melanoma)
follow_up_questions: Have you noticed any unusual skin growths?
Do you spend significant time in the sun?

diseases.name: Pancreatic Cancer
follow_up_questions: Do you have unexplained weight loss and abdominal pain?
Have you noticed yellowing of your skin or eyes?

diseases.name: Ovarian Cancer
follow_up_questions: Do you have persistent abdominal bloating?
Have you experienced pelvic pain?

diseases.name: Cervical Cancer
follow_up_questions: Have you had abnormal Pap smear results?
Are you experiencing unusual vaginal bleeding?

diseases.name: Endometrial Cancer
follow_up_questions: Are you experiencing abnormal vaginal bleeding?
Do you have a history of hormonal imbalances?

diseases.name: Testicular Cancer
symptoms: Lump or swelling in the testicle
follow_up_questions: Have you noticed any lumps in your testicles?
Do you experience discomfort in your scrotum?

diseases.name: Brain Tumor
follow_up_questions: Do you have persistent headaches?
Have you experienced changes in vision or personality?

diseases.name: Chronic Kidney Disease
follow_up_questions: Have you had abnormal kidney function tests?
Do you experience swelling in your legs?

diseases.name: Acute Kidney Injury
follow_up_questions: Have you recently had a significant drop in urine output?
Did you experience severe dehydration or infection?

diseases.name: Glomerulonephritis
follow_up_questions: Do you have dark or bloody urine?
Have you experienced swelling in your face or extremities?

diseases.name: Urinary Incontinence
follow_up_questions: Do you experience unexpected urine leakage?
Does it occur during physical activity?

diseases.name: Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia
follow_up_questions: Do you have difficulty starting urination?
Is your urine stream weak?

diseases.name: Cataracts
follow_up_questions: Do you have difficulty seeing clearly?
Have you noticed colors appearing faded?

diseases.name: Glaucoma
follow_up_questions: Have you experienced a gradual loss of peripheral vision?
Do you experience eye pain or halos?

diseases.name: Macular Degeneration
follow_up_questions: Do you have difficulty with tasks requiring central vision?
Have you noticed changes in the clarity of your vision?

diseases.name: Diabetic Retinopathy
follow_up_questions: Have you been diagnosed with diabetes?
Do you experience progressive vision changes?

diseases.name: Conjunctivitis
follow_up_questions: Do you have red, irritated eyes?
Is there discharge from your eyes?

diseases.name: Otitis Media (Ear Infection)
follow_up_questions: Is your ear pain accompanied by fever?
Do you experience hearing loss?

diseases.name: Tinnitus
symptoms: Ringing or buzzing in the ears
follow_up_questions: Do you constantly hear ringing in your ears?
Is it interfering with your daily activities?

diseases.name: Sinusitis
follow_up_questions: Do you experience facial pressure or pain?
Is your nasal discharge thick and discolored?

diseases.name: Allergic Rhinitis
follow_up_questions: Do you have symptoms triggered by allergens?
Are your eyes itchy along with a runny nose?

diseases.name: Eczema
follow_up_questions: Do you have a history of dry, itchy skin?
Are your rashes recurring?

diseases.name: Psoriasis
follow_up_questions: Do you have persistent red, scaly patches?
Are your joints affected as well?

diseases.name: Acne Vulgaris
follow_up_questions: Do you experience recurring breakouts?
Is your acne severe enough to cause scarring?

diseases.name: Rosacea
follow_up_questions: Do you experience persistent facial redness?
Are your symptoms triggered by heat or spicy foods?

diseases.name: Lupus (Systemic Lupus Erythematosus)
follow_up_questions: Do you experience a butterfly rash on your face?
Is your joint pain worsened by sun exposure?

diseases.name: Fibromyalgia
follow_up_questions: Do you experience widespread pain and fatigue?
Does stress make your symptoms worse?

diseases.name: Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
follow_up_questions: Is your fatigue persistent and unexplained?
Does rest not seem to help?

diseases.name: Endometriosis
follow_up_questions: Do you experience severe menstrual cramps?
Have you been diagnosed with endometriosis?

diseases.name: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS)
follow_up_questions: Do you have irregular menstrual cycles?
Are you experiencing symptoms like excess hair or acne?

diseases.name: Infertility
symptoms: Inability to conceive after one year of unprotected intercourse
follow_up_questions: Have you been trying to conceive for over a year?
Have you consulted a fertility specialist?

diseases.name: Varicose Veins
follow_up_questions: Do you notice swollen veins in your legs?
Is your leg pain worse after standing?

diseases.name: Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT)
symptoms: Pain or tenderness in the leg
follow_up_questions: Do you experience unilateral leg swelling?
Have you been immobile for long periods?

diseases.name: Hyperlipidemia
follow_up_questions: Have you had high cholesterol levels in recent tests?
Do you follow a high-fat diet?
